text: Miguel del Valle (born July 24, 1951) is an American politician. He was the City Clerk of Chicago. He was an Illinois State Senator from 1987–2006. Del Valle lost his bid for mayor in Chicago's February 22, 2011 municipal elections, coming in third with 53,953 votes. ==References== ==Other websites== *Del Valle for Mayor *Miguel del Valle — Chicago City Clerk *Miguel del Valle — Illinois General Assembly *Senator Miguel del Valle — Project Vote Smart Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Chicago Category:Puerto Rican politicians Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Miguel del Valle
